name: Survival Intelligence
description:
AI Simulation for survival instinct in carnivore, herbivore and omnivores.

  • The Lion likes to hunt for cows and lonely humans. 
  • The humans are here to cut down all the trees.
  • The cows need to graze all the grass.
  • However, the Lion is afraid of finding humans in groups or even to enter the Village. 

Your goal is to help the villagers clear the land and return back home safely.
